function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation of green areas with concepts such as 'awareness', 'city', 'greenery', 'lack', and 'urbanization'.","Impact":"Could lead to the spread of contagious diseases if urbanization and lack of green areas contribute to unhealthy living environments.","Mitigation":"Increase awareness of the importance of green areas in urban planning and promote policies that prioritize green spaces.","Technologies":"Urban planning software, geographic information systems (GIS) for green space mapping.","People":"Urban residents, city planners, policymakers.","Owner":"City governments, urban planning agencies."},{"Description":"PCA analysis linking 'green areas', 'trees', and 'citizens' with 'nature', 'man', and 'to create'.","Impact":"Potential risk of disease transmission related to the interaction between citizens, nature, and green areas.","Mitigation":"Promote responsible use of green areas, educate citizens on the health benefits of nature, and implement policies for sustainable green space management.","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, urban green space management tools.","People":"Citizens, urban residents, environmental organizations.","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies."},{"Description":"Thematic analysis identifying concepts related to governance, awareness, and benefits and services in the context of green spaces.","Impact":"Lack of governance and awareness could lead to inadequate management of green areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Strengthen governance structures for green space management, enhance public awareness of the health benefits of green areas, and improve access to green space-related benefits and services.","Technologies":"Governance frameworks, public awareness campaigns, digital platforms for green space services.","People":"City officials, environmental organizations, general public.","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies."}]}
